New Records: Steph Curry scored a season-high 36 points, his first 30-point game of the season.
The Golden State Warriors set a new record with 30 three-pointers made in the game.
Key Match Events: Steph Curry buried two clutch three-pointers to ice the game in the fourth quarter.
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder, a top team in the Western Conference.
Pre-Game Insights: The Golden State Warriors leaned on Steph Curry against a tough opponent, highlighting his importance to the team.
Post-Match Reflections: Steph Curry's performance was crucial in ending their five-game road trip with a victory.
The game marked Steph Curry's highly-anticipated return matchup with his former teammate Klay Thompson.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant as part of the Golden State Warriors' five-game road trip.
